column5: Just outside in T.O here and lightening is in the skies. Apparently tornado warnings around L.Huron etc... Looks like thunderstorms across south cenral ontario are supposed to be severe overnight. Lots of lightening from Barrie south towards Toronto, so take care.
Listening to the thunder as I type this and watching the flashes in the sky.  Love to watch a good storm but not the damage they can do.
